content.title: Key takeaways
content.intro: If you only have space to remember 3 things:

takeaways.title: Grounding M&E in the local context
takeaways.description: Understand the local context to ensure that M&E is relevant and useful.

takeaways.title: Engaging stakeholders
takeaways.description: Involve stakeholders in the M&E process to ensure that it meets their needs.

takeaways.title: Using data for decision-making
takeaways.description: Use data to inform decisions and improve programs.
